scripts.worker:dev: WRANGLER_SEND_METRICS=false XDG_CONFIG_HOME=.wrangler-home npx wrangler dev --local --show-interactive-dev-session=false --config worker/wrangler.toml --port 8787
scripts.worker:deploy: WRANGLER_SEND_METRICS=false XDG_CONFIG_HOME=.wrangler-home npx wrangler deploy --config worker/wrangler.toml
scripts.worker:kv:create: WRANGLER_SEND_METRICS=false XDG_CONFIG_HOME=.wrangler-home npx wrangler kv namespace create AI_SESSIONS --config worker/wrangler.toml
scripts.worker:secret:set: WRANGLER_SEND_METRICS=false XDG_CONFIG_HOME=.wrangler-home npx wrangler secret put KEY_ENCRYPTION_SECRET --config worker/wrangler.toml
